steps.title: Draw a large oval above the triangle from Step 1.
steps.content: Draw a large oval above the triangle from Step 1.

steps.title: Draw a rectangle below the triangle from Step 1.
steps.content: Draw a rectangle below the triangle from Step 1.

steps.title: Draw a circle around the triangle from Step 1.
steps.content: Draw a circle around the triangle from Step 1.

steps.title: Draw 2 ovals for eyes and mark placements for other facial features.
steps.content: Draw 2 ovals for eyes and mark placements for other facial features. Also add lines for shoulders and hair.

steps.title: Outline the drawing with permanent media.
steps.content: Outline the drawing with permanent media. Use anything you like. Ink or Draw paint are recommended. Erase the unnecessary guidelines. Add shading if desired.
